alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:00PM CDT until April 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 659 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Ringgold, or 23 miles southeast of Bossier City, moving east at 10 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR Ringgold. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ringgold, Lucky, Castor, Bienville, Jamestown and Lake Bistineau South. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
